name: Burbgher
description:
How to play:

Fling burgers towards approaching customers using the mouse. Try to reach 310 score with within 1 minute.

Deliver burgers to customers too quickly and you'll be swarmed with more hungry customers than you can deal with! The less time you leave customers waiting, the more your popularity will increase. With too many incomplete orders, your score will tank and you won't be able to win the game!

IMPORTANT!!

Burgers spawn inside the shop not outside.

Not serving the first customer leads to one liking your spot so nobody else will come after him :)

Concept

Burgers are physics governed so fling your mouse from left to right as fast as you can to flight the burger further

Controls

Move - WASD

Pickup/Throw - Hold left click to pick up. Release to throw

Escape - Pause menu
